name: Name
tip1: Select the mercenary list, and click the formation. Or just drag and drop.
tip2: Drag the mercenary in the grid to change the position.
tip3: Right click can set skill enhancement level.
tip4: Double-click or drag to the right to remove the mercenaries in the grid.
tip6: Click [download] to get image or [copylink] get share link.
browser-mobile-alert: The desktop is better than the mobile.
